for browsing some of the repositories. Please check out each individual project site how to clone a git repository.

content.text: Some projects provide packages in .deb format. Please check out each individual project site for available architecture and so on. Basically the debian repository is available via '[deb|deb-src] http://deb.buetow.org/apt REPLACEWITHDISTNAME main'.
To trust it please run "curl http://deb.buetow.org/apt/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add -"
